description: Erik Grant decides that he and Andy Hunter should work out their problems with the help of supercute Owen Hawk. He brings the beefy boy back to the house, and the three hunks hit the sheets for some cocksucking and buttfucking. Once again, Hunter gets his hole worked, both orally and by Grants oversize tool. Hawk also joins in the fun, topping Hunter and getting topped by Grant. Finally resolving their issues, the happy couple both shoot all over Hawks hairy chest, and the sun sets on this award-winning saga!
title: Andy Hunter, Erik Grant, Owen Hawk
